subject: Fix reader mode canvas not using available space
body:
The ResizeObserver tracking container width was set up with an empty
dependency array, so it only observed the editor mode's DOM element.
When switching to reader mode, the ref pointed to a new DOM element
but the observer was still watching the old (removed) one, causing
containerWidth to go stale. This made the canvas render much smaller
than the available viewport.

Adding isReaderMode to the dependency array ensures the observer
re-attaches to the correct DOM element on mode switch.
